definition: to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: If the holder loses the interest, it's no big deal.
sentences.chinese: 如果持有人失去了利息，這樣就不會有大的交易。

sentences.english: The Permit Holder shall provide portable toilet for the on- site construction workforce.
sentences.chinese: 許可證持有人須爲駐工地建築工人提供流動洗手間。

sentences.english: Please ensure that all the account holder(s) or authorized signatories sign this exchange form.
sentences.chinese: 請帳戶持有人或法人代表於此處簽名。

sentences.english: How important is the technology to the licensor?
sentences.chinese: 這項技術對許可證持有人有多重要？

sentences.english: Any deletion or amendment must be initialed by all account holder(s).
sentences.chinese: 任何刪除或修改必須由全部帳戶持有人簽署作實。

sentences.english: What is available for Community Services Card holders?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是社區服務卡持有人提供？

sentences.english: MR. DAVID ANGELL was an account holder with my bank.
sentences.chinese: 大衛先生是一個天使與銀行賬戶持有人。

sentences.english: Holders of postal accounts and offshore accounts were flightier .
sentences.chinese: 郵儲用戶和國外帳戶持有人則要多變得多。

sentences.english: All the bond bears have been dead wrong in predicting sky-high mortgage rates.
sentences.chinese: 所有的債券持有人都預測錯高企的抵押貸款利率。

sentences.english: Visible Certificates are registered and the holders of these can report any loss directly to the bank.
sentences.chinese: 憑證式國債是記名式的，持有人可以直接向銀行掛失。

sentences.english: The content of this web-site is the copyright of Fong & Yeung Studio.
sentences.chinese: 本網址的內容，其版權持有人爲楊方創作室。

sentences.english: We hope you are CFA charter holder, or at least passed level2.
sentences.chinese: 希望您是CFA證照持有人，或至少通過二級考試。

sentences.english: For example, the interest earned by a bondholder between semiannual coupon payments.
sentences.chinese: 債券持有人在每半年支付一次的息票獲得的利息。

sentences.english: Any changes should be initialed by New Policyholder.
sentences.chinese: 任何答案如有更改，敬請新保單持有人在旁簽署。

sentences.english: Proof of identity of both the licensee and transferee .
sentences.chinese: 牌照持有人及準受讓人的身分證明文件。

definition: legal person/corporation/see also 自然人[zi4 ran2 ren2]
permanent resident/person with the right to live in a country or territory
natural person (law)/see also 法人[fa3 ren2]
